name: Dark Matter
blurb: A modern, tense reimagining of classic platforming action games, with a deep storyline and tactical combat. Help us finish it!

rewards.reward: Civilian pledge. This buys you a safe, warm place in our hearts as we think of all those who helped us make Dark Matter a reality.

Shipmate pledge. You will receive access to Dark Matter's latest beta upon successful completion of the Kickstarter, as well as a DRM-free download of the game for Windows, OSX and Linux as soon as it's released. (Steam keys will be distributed pending Valve's approval of the game on Steam)
Docking Crew pledge. You will receive access to the latest beta, a DRM-free download version of the finished game, and Dark Matter's soundtrack in digital format.

Ensign pledge. You will receive access to the latest game beta as well as bi-weekly (twice a month) beta builds, a DRM-free download version of the finished game, the soundtrack download, and a Steam key for Nuclear Dawn thrown in for the bargain!

Lieutenant pledge. You will receive access to the latest game beta, bi-weekly (twice a month) builds, TWO DRM-free copies of the finished game, the soundtrack download, an exclusive Dark Matter t-shirt, and access to a special developer forum, with weekly chats with the development team, as well as a Nuclear Dawn Steam key.

Commander pledge. You will receive everything from the Lieutenant pledge level (beta, beta access, 2x game downloads, Nuclear Dawn Steam key, t-shirt, dev forums and chat), along with being listed in the game's credits as a 'Friend of InterWave'.

Captain pledge. You will receive access to the latest game beta, bi-weekly (twice a month) builds, FIVE DRM-free copies of Dark Matter when it's released, the soundtrack download, access to the developer forums, weekly developer chats, two exclusive Dark Matter t-shirts, a unique Dark Matter poster, and FIVE pieces of digital concept art, as well as a Nuclear Dawn Steam key.

Admiral pledge. You will receive every item on the Captain-level pledge (beta, builds twice a month, forum and developer chats, 5 copies of the game, two t-shirts, a poster, five pieces of digital concept art), plus one printed concept piece of your choice, and TWO one-on-one developer chats to help you affect game development directly.

Seeker pledge. This level includes every item on the Admiral plege (beta, builds twice a month, forum and developer chats, 5 copies of the game, two t-shirts, a poster, five pieces of digital concept art, printed concept piece and two one-on-one dev chats), along with a chance to have yourself, or a friend of your choice, directly mentioned in the Dark Matter's logs.

Samurai pledge. This level includes everything from the Seeker pledge (beta, builds twice a month, forum and developer chats, 5 copies of the game, two t-shirts, a poster, five pieces of digital concept art, printed concept piece and two one-on-one dev chats, direct mention in the game logs), plus the chance to name one of the in-game log writers after yourself or one of your friends of your choice.

Behemoth pledge. This level includes everything from the Samurai pledge, plus an open invitation to come visit us as our guest in Sittard, the Netherlands. You get over here, and we'll take care of you for two days and a night, give you a chance to visit the office, chat with the team, ride Floris' desk, and have a chance to request a special Dark Matter feature.
